last_episode_to_air.name: Get to the Finish Line
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the roommates' time in New Orleans comes to an end, they reflect on how they've all changed since 2000 and leave their mark on the city one last time. With the help of Melissa's old friend, the roommates memorialize their experience with a mural.

name: The Real World Homecoming
overview: After spending decades apart, the roommates featured in The Real World reconnect to find out how the series transformed their lives since the cameras stopped rolling, and they’ll discover, once again, what happens when people stop being polite… and start getting real.

seasons.name: New York
seasons.overview: Almost 30 years later, the original “seven strangers” that paved the way for modern reality TV are moving back into the New York loft where it all began. The cast from the very first season of The Real World reunites to find out, once again, what happens when they stop being polite… and start getting real.

seasons.name: Los Angeles
seasons.overview: If The Real World NY was the first reality tv cast, the Real World LA featured the first cast to actually know they were on a reality show. Now, 28 years later, the group will reunite in their Venice Beach house to find out what happened after the cameras turned off and they moved forward with their lives.

seasons.name: New Orleans
seasons.overview: 21 years later, the fan-favorite Real World: New Orleans roommates are moving back to “The Big Easy” together! The cast reunites for a dramatic, nostalgic, and heartfelt reunion with the out-of-touch roommates who have unfinished business and they find out what happened after the cameras turned off and moved forward with their lives.

tagline: The original roommates move back in.

episodes.name: Back To Reality
episodes.overview: The original seven strangers from the first season of MTV's groundbreaking "The Real World" move back into the same New York loft where it all began, but a shocking announcement threatens to derail their reunion before it starts.

episodes.name: The More Things Change...
episodes.overview: As the roommates open up, surprising secrets emerge and discussions about the past reveal old wounds. And revisiting a heated conversation from 29 years ago puts the entire loft on edge.

episodes.name: Listen
episodes.overview: A charged conversation about racism sends shockwaves through the loft, and Eric opens up about traumatic events from his past.

episodes.name: Starting Over
episodes.overview: While adjusting to an unexpected new reality in the loft, the roommates rally around Norman as details of a personal crisis are revealed.

episodes.name: It’s About All of Us
episodes.overview: Norman reveals the highs and lows of being one of the first openly gay people on television. As talk of Becky's possible return fills the loft, Julie finds herself playing the role of mediator, and the roommates attempt to find closure.

episodes.name: From The Real World to The New World
episodes.overview: Kevin lays it all on the line. The roommates learn the answers to some long-held questions when a pair of surprise guests come to the door. And as they prepare to leave the loft for the second time, the original seven strangers reflect on their past.

1.name: New York
1.overview: Almost 30 years later, the original “seven strangers” that paved the way for modern reality TV are moving back into the New York loft where it all began. The cast from the very first season of The Real World reunites to find out, once again, what happens when they stop being polite… and start getting real.

episodes.name: It's Still Not Funny
episodes.overview: The roommates from The Real World: Los Angeles move back into their original Venice beach house, 28 years later, to relive one of the most memorable seasons in reality TV history. Before they can truly reunite, they'll have to settle unfinished business.

episodes.name: Raw Footage
episodes.overview: The roommates continue discussing the events that led to David's removal from the house. Never-before-seen footage from 1993 leads the roommates to view David in a different light. Tami feels betrayed after she makes an emotional confession that goes unnoticed by the roommates.

episodes.name: We Gonna Be Real or We Not
episodes.overview: After Jon tries to shut down a discussion about his love life, Tami confronts her roommates about their unwillingness to have honest conversations. A fun night out leads to unpredictable behavior from David. And Beth S is desperate for Tami's approval.

episodes.name: Something Borrowed, Something Blew
episodes.overview: The roommates embark on a luxurious yacht trip. Tami tries to mediate an explosive fight between Beth S. and David. Jon volunteers to officiate a vow renewal between Irene and her husband. Glen reveals a tragic turn in his life.

episodes.name: Moving Forward with a New Story
episodes.overview: The roommates revisit Tami's decision to have an abortion in 1993 and reveal some personal experiences of their own. On a spiritual trip to Joshua Tree, Real World New York's Eric Nies helps Glen seek closure over the death of his ex-girlfriend.

episodes.name: Aint Done Singin' Yet
episodes.overview: Hoping to revive his country music career, Jon plans a comeback concert. A friendly game amongst roommates becomes a heated discussion about race relations in America. David sets the record straight about a harmful allegation he made in 1993.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight (1)
episodes.overview: Tami confronts David over his lack of support during the roommates' race conversation, leading to an explosive fight. Tami's husband arrives at the house to confront David. An imminent visit from her transgender son leads Beth A to revisit her journey.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight (2)
episodes.overview: After a day of arguing and a close encounter with Tami's husband, David makes a big decision concerning his presence in the house. Beth A has an emotional reunion with her transgender son. As their time together comes to an end, the roommates reflect.

2.name: Los Angeles
2.overview: If The Real World NY was the first reality tv cast, the Real World LA featured the first cast to actually know they were on a reality show. Now, 28 years later, the group will reunite in their Venice Beach house to find out what happened after the cameras turned off and they moved forward with their lives.

episodes.name: The Real 7
episodes.overview: The roommates from The Real World New Orleans are moving back in and reuniting for the first time in 22 years. Decades long feuds quickly resurface.

episodes.name: Outta Bounds (1)
episodes.overview: Danny opens up about living in the spotlight, post-Real World. Julie's attempts to get back in the roommates' good graces are derailed by a wild night out.

episodes.name: Outta Bounds (2)
episodes.overview: Julie's erratic behavior rubs her roommates the wrong way, leading to a confrontation with Tokyo. Danny and ex-boyfriend Paul meet for the first time since their breakup.

episodes.name: It Shouldn't be Comfortable, We're talking about Racism
episodes.overview: The roommates continue to try to make Julie understand why her complaints about Tokyo's actions towards her after a wild night out were harmful. And a surprise visit brings some fun to a tense household.

episodes.name: There's Something About Jamie
episodes.overview: Jamie and Julie have rekindled their old friendship, but a shocking revelation about their past sexual history leaves the roommates wondering whether they might be more than friends. Danny calls Matt out for some homophobic comments from 2000.

episodes.name: Spiritual Bypassings
episodes.overview: While Matt continues to wonder if his presence in the house is at odds with his religious faith, Julie drops a bombshell about her own religious beliefs. A visit from Julie's husband ends in chaos.

episodes.name: It's Not Regret, It's Reset
episodes.overview: Kelley finds herself in increasingly uncomfortable situations in the house. In the aftermath of his visit, Julie's husband gives her a hall pass to do with as she pleases. With his roommates' help, Tokyo resurrects "Come On Be My Baby Tonight".

episodes.name: Get to the Finish Line
episodes.overview: As the roommates' time in New Orleans comes to an end, they reflect on how they've all changed since 2000 and leave their mark on the city one last time. With the help of Melissa's old friend, the roommates memorialize their experience with a mural.

3.name: New Orleans
3.overview: 21 years later, the fan-favorite Real World: New Orleans roommates are moving back to “The Big Easy” together! The cast reunites for a dramatic, nostalgic, and heartfelt reunion with the out-of-touch roommates who have unfinished business and they find out what happened after the cameras turned off and moved forward with their lives.
